Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Canopy seal deterioration. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 07/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
